concept.description: Labels all classes annotated by "jakarta.interceptor.Interceptor" with "Interceptor", "JEE" and "Injectable".
concept.cypher: MATCH (interceptor:Type:Class)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(interceptorType:Type) WHERE interceptorType.fqn = "jakarta.interceptor.Interceptor" SET interceptor:Interceptor:JEE:Injectable RETURN interceptor AS Interceptor

concept.description: Labels all annotations annotated by "jakarta.interceptor.InterceptorBinding" with "InterceptorBinding".
concept.cypher: MATCH (binding:Type:Annotation)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(bindingType:Type) WHERE bindingType.fqn = "jakarta.interceptor.InterceptorBinding" SET binding:InterceptorBinding RETURN binding AS InterceptorBinding
